This phase quantifies the orientation of the colloidal crystal structure with respect to a reference axis. Two maps at different Q-values in Figure 12 g,h show the existence of patches of similar orientations within the sample, which resemble the drying front of silica particle suspensions. An analogous approach which includes a combination of the focused X-ray beam and AXCCA was used in [ 19] to investigate patches with four- and sixfold orientational order in the film of self-assembled gold nanoparticles.
